helpText: Ř_Edit, delete, or reorder categories in your organization______________________________ů.

generic.title: Ř_Error updating categories__________________________ů
generic.message: Ř_Something went wrong. Please try again later________________________ů.

maxDepthExceeded.title: Ř_Error updating categories__________________________ů
maxDepthExceeded.message: Ř_You cannot nest categories more than 2 levels deep___________________________ů.

destinationHasSameName.title: Ř_Error updating categories__________________________ů
destinationHasSameName.message: Ř_A category with the same name already exists in the destination category______________________________________ů.

noSchema.title: Ř_Schema not found_________________ů
noSchema.message: Ř_Item schema not found for user_________________ů.

maxCharacter.title: Ř_Error updating categories__________________________ů
maxCharacter.message: Ř_Category names can be a maximum of ${maxCharacter} characters long___________________________________ů.

deleteInUseCategory.title: Ř_Delete category________________ů
deleteInUseCategory.message: Ř_${numItem} items are assigned to this category. Deleting the category will also remove it from these items_______________________________________________________ů.

custom.title: Ř_Custom categories__________________ů
custom.message: Ř_Create your own categories to organize content within your organization_____________________________________ů.

arcgis.title: Ř_ArcGIS categories__________________ů
arcgis.message: Ř_ArcGIS categories include a selection of topic categories and subcategories that can be used to categorize many types of geospatial content. These categories are used to support ArcGIS Living Atlas of the World___________________________________________________________________________________________________________ů.

iso.title: Ř_ISO categories_______________ů
iso.message: Ř_ISO categories includes topic categories from the International Organization for Standardization that provide a method for describing and cataloging geographic information_______________________________________________________________________________________ů.

inspire.title: Ř_INSPIRE categories___________________ů
inspire.message: Ř_INSPIRE categories include a comprehensive set of spatial data themes set out in the INSPIRE Directive_____________________________________________________ů.
